entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 10:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
